comment: The subspace sum of a closed subspace and an atom is closed. TODO: see if proof at http://math.stackexchange.com/a/1233211/50776 and Mon, 13 Apr 2015 20:44:07 -0400 email could be used instead of this and ~ dihjat2 . (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
